author: FRANKLIN SHINES JR

description.zh_Hans: 防盗GPT提供多种“防黑客”选项，保护您的GPT自定义指令、知识库和专有信息，确保数字资产的完整性。
description.zh_Hant: 防盜GPT提供多種“防黑客”選項，保護您的GPT自定義指令、知識庫和專有信息，確保數字資產的完整性。
description.en: StoptheSteal GPT offers a range of 'Hack Prevent' options to protect your GPT's custom instructions, knowledge base, and proprietary information, ensuring the integrity of your digital assets.
